trans-unit.source: Represents a single composition operation for transactional composition.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션 컴퍼지션에 대 한 단일 컴퍼지션 작업을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> class with the specified parent <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> 지정 된 부모 클래스 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The parent of this composition operation.
Adds an action to be executed when the overall composition operation completes successfully.
trans-unit.target: 전체 컴퍼지션 작업이 성공적으로 완료 될 때 실행할 작업을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The action to be executed.
Adds an action to be executed if the overall composition operation fails.
trans-unit.target: 전체 컴퍼지션 작업이 실패 하는 경우 실행할 작업을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The action to be executed.
Marks this composition operation as complete.
If this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> is nested, completion actions will not be executed until the parent composition operation has also completed.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>은 중첩 완료 작업을 실행 하지 못합니다 부모 컴포지션 작업이 완료 될 때까지.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> class, and mark this composition operation as failed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에서 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> 클래스와이 컴퍼지션 작업을 실패 한 것으로 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 `Dispose` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> in an unusable state.

After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 호출한 후 `Dispose`에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>차지한.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 항상 호출 `Dispose` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AtomicComposition"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Saves a key-value pair in the transaction to track tentative state.
trans-unit.target: 임시 상태를 추적 하는 트랜잭션에서 키-값 쌍을 저장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The key to save.
The value to save.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
